text: aur unakee tauba (kshama yaachana) sveekaary nahin, jo buraeeyaan karate rahate hain, yahaan tak ki jab unamen se kisee kee maut ka samay aa jaata hai, to kahata haih ab mainne tauba kar lee. na hee unakee (tauba sveekaar kee jaayegee) jo kaafir rahate hue mar jaate hain, inheen ke lie hamane duhkhadaayee yaatana taiyaar kar rakhee hai
